data.title: Task Management App
data.description: A full-stack task management application built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include real-time updates, user authentication, and drag-and-drop functionality.
data.meta_description: Full-stack task management application with real-time updates

data.title: E-Commerce Platform
data.description: A complete e-commerce solution with product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing, and admin dashboard. Built with Next.js and Stripe integration.
data.meta_description: Full-featured e-commerce platform with payment processing

data.title: Weather Dashboard
data.description: An interactive weather dashboard with real-time weather data, forecasts, and location-based services. Responsive design with beautiful data visualizations.
data.meta_description: Interactive weather dashboard with real-time data and forecasts

data.title: Personal Blog CMS
data.description: A content management system for personal blogging with markdown support, SEO optimization, and admin panel. Built with Python Django and React.
data.meta_description: Custom CMS for blogging with markdown support and SEO optimization

data.title: Interactive Portfolio
data.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website with 3D animations, smooth transitions, and interactive elements. Built with Next.js and Three.js.
data.meta_description: Modern portfolio website with 3D animations and interactive elements

data.title: Social Media App
data.description: A full-stack social media application with real-time messaging, post sharing, and user authentication. Mobile-responsive design with PWA capabilities.
data.meta_description: Full-stack social media application with real-time messaging

data.title: BookerBarber
data.description: A comprehensive booking system for barbershops built with the MERN stack. Allows customers to book appointments and barbers to manage their schedules efficiently.
data.meta_description: MERN stack barbershop booking system with appointment management

data.title: Code Challenge Generator
data.description: An AI-powered coding challenge generator built with FastAPI and machine learning. Creates personalized programming problems and solutions for developers to practice and improve their skills.
data.meta_description: AI-powered coding challenge generator using FastAPI and machine learning
